name: @naologic/forms
description: A collection of Nao public libraries
author: Gabriel

scripts.copy:forms: rm -rf dist/naologic/forms && cp README.md projects/naologic/forms/  && cp LICENSE.md projects/naologic/forms/
scripts.build:forms: npm run copy:forms && ng build @naologic/forms --configuration=production && cd dist/naologic/forms/ && npm pack
scripts.publish:forms: npm run build:forms && cd dist/naologic/forms/ && npm publish --scope=@naologic --access public
scripts.copy:pipes: rm -rf dist/naologic/pipes && cp README.md projects/naologic/pipes/  && cp LICENSE.md projects/naologic/pipes/
scripts.build:pipes: npm run copy:pipes && ng build @naologic/pipes --configuration=production && cd dist/naologic/pipes/ && npm pack
scripts.publish:pipes: npm run build:pipes && cd dist/naologic/pipes/ && npm publish --scope=@naologic --access public
scripts.publish: npm run publish:forms && npm run publish:pipes
